label: Ballet I
description: Introduction to ballet for nondance majors. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: For non-dance majors.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: For non-dance majors.
classScheduleInformation: Student costs for supplies and concert tickets are approx. $30. Written assignments and concert attendance is required.
